title: Real-Time Chat Application
description: Developed a dynamic chat app with secure, real-time messaging capabilities.

title: Short URL
description: Developed a full stack web application for shortening URLs, featuring a user-friendly interface and efficient backend operation.

title: Quiz Application
description: A full-stack quiz platform with timed quizzes, score calculation, and a leaderboard. Built using React.js for the frontend and Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for the backend.
